name: Mississippi Trail
description:
A weird game where you burn alive from atomic hellfire in Mississippi.

5/28/67,  15:47  CST.  Multiple nuclear bombs have been detected on the radar. Every single one is heading for this remote area of Mississippi. 

You've been chosen to save Mississippi.

What can you even do? Warn everyone you can find? Float across the ocean and stop the launch from the source? Minimize casualties? Kill everyone you encounter? Save yourself? Are these people even worth it?

Find out now in the very odd Mississippi Trail.

Extremely exciting epic totally real insane features:

  • multiple endings
  • one full hour of an authentic high quality indie title
  • wacky jokes and characters sure to make you slap your knees in confusion
  • "fleshed out" dialogue trees
  • secrets
  • puzzles (maybe)
